data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 165,200 people living in the state of Al Wahat.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Wahat, Libya
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Al Wahat, Libya.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 32 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Al Wahat, Libya.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Al Wahat who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Al Wahat, Libya.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Al Wahat that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Al Wahat against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Wahat, Libya has a population of 165,200.

We estimate Al Wahat has 262 people who might know Jesus, 3,824 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 161,114 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 630 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 262 believers in Al Wahat to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 164,938 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
